item_description: A gemstone that glows blue. Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.

Caprity meat. Healthy and full of nutrients.
Hints of berries scenting the meat stimulates the appetite.
A versatile ingredient that is delicious raw or cooked. They can be found anywhere on the island.
A key that can unlock locked treasure chests.
Strange Medical Supplies that are effective at treating Ulcer and Fracture. they do not heal Health.

Plump poultry sautéed in butter. Accented with fresh lemons.
Eat to slightly increase work speed for a period of time.
An Arrow for use with a bow.

droppers.name: Archer of the Sands Robinquill Terra

item_description:
Indulges in an abundance of fresh berries to create a tantalizing aroma that accentuates the unique flavor of mutton.
Eat to increase Defense by +10% for a period of time.
A gemstone that glows red. Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.
Material required to create weapons and armor using Pal Metal. Made stronger by creating an alloy from metal and Paldium.
A lightweight yet sturdy material. Used to create armor among other equipment.
Cloth woven from Wool. Required to create armor.
Pure Quartz often found in snowy fields and similar places. Required to create Circuit Board.

droppers.name: Legendary Steed of Darkness Frostallion Noct

item_description: Body fluids taken from a Pal. Useful for its high viscosity.

droppers.name: Ruler of the Cobalt Dusk Suzaku Aqua

item_description:
Rushoar meat. Full of the delicious flavors of wild game.
Juicy and nutritious.
Plume dropped from a Penking. Used to make clothing.

droppers.name: Pioneer of the Frozen Sea Penking

item_description:
Seeds that produce Red Berries. Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be obtained when picking Red Berries.
Low Grade Medical Supplies good for colds and sprains. They don't heal HP when eaten, however.

droppers.name: Star of the Flower Beds Flopie
Empress of the Abyss Lyleen Noct

item_description: A spirit left behind by a small Pal. It can draw out hidden abilities if offered to a Statue of Power.
Hair dropped from a Katress. Used to make clothing.
A book that contains secrets of amazing technology. Use it to obtain a few Technology Points.
Delicious when fried, but can also be used to cook various meals. Chikipi produce them.

Chikipi meat. Light and easy to eat,
it's a local favorite for residents of Palpagos Island.
Gunpowder used to fire ammunition. Required to make bullets.
Feathers dropped from a Tocotoco. Used to make clothing, as the beautifully vivid colors are quite popular.

Mozzarina meat. Thick, juicy and marbled.
Residents of Palpagos Island cherish it above all other meats.
Drink it as is, or use it in various meals. Can be milked from Mozzarina.
Honey harvested from Beegarde. It's sweet and tasty.

Seeds that produce Lettuce. Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be purchased from a merchant.

droppers.name: Guardian of the Grassy Fields Wumpo Botan

item_description:
Seeds that produce Wheat. Necessary for starting a farm.
Can be purchased from a merchant.

droppers.name: Star of the Flower Beds Flopie

item_description: Material obtainable from poisonous Pals. Can be used to make Poison Arrow and more.
Coal often found in caves and other places. Required to create high quality metal.
Eikthyrdeer meat. Light and lean, but rich in flavor.

Becomes an ingot when refined using a furnace. Can be found in caves and other places.
There are rumors of Pals capable of detecting ore.
High-quality oil that can be extracted from Pal. Necessary for making Polymer.

droppers.name: Beast of the Tides Elphidran Aqua

item_description: Galeclaw meat. Full of nutrition, its flavor packs a punch.
Material obtainable from Electric Pals. It stores electricity, but requires caution when used.

droppers.name: Inheritor of the Storm Mossanda Lux

item_description: Bread made from baked Flour. A tasty staple food.
Ammo for Assault Rifle and other similar weapons.

item_description: A plant that blooms colorful flowers. Can be used to make Suspicious Juice and Strange Juice.

droppers.name: Empress of the Abyss Lyleen Noct
Guardian of the Snowy Mountain Wumpo

item_description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Mass produced, it is only effective on low level Pals.

Mammorest meat. With massive size comes massive flavor.
Its overwhelming portions are sure to satisfy any glutton.
A mushroom that can be eaten raw. They can be found anywhere on the island.

droppers.name: Inheritor of the Storm Mossanda Lux

item_description: An item that captures Pals when thrown. Its capabilities have been improved, allowing it to catch a wider range of Pals.
Bullets used in shotguns and similar firearms.
A spirit left behind by a Pal. It can draw out hidden abilities if offered to a Statue of Power.

droppers.name: Brothers of the Eternal Pyre Martyr
Brothers of the Eternal Pyre Martyr

item_description: Ammo for Musket, Makeshift Handgun, and other similar weapons.
A sphere that captures Pals when thrown. Able to capture moderately powerful Pals.
Ammo for Rocket Launcher and other similar weapons.

Reindrix meat. Strange venison capable of remaining at low temperatures.
Takes a very long time to spoil.
A rare gemstone that glows brilliantly. Can be sold to a merchant for a high price.
Made from refined oil. Required for producing various advanced items such as rifles.

Kelpsea meat. Tender and slightly sweet.
Fish meat tends to spoil quickly.

droppers.name: Child of Molten Depths Kelpsea Ignis

item_description: A key that can unlock locked treasure chests.
A key that can unlock locked treasure chests.
Crystallized energy from the World Tree. Capable of creating supernatural items and structures.
Leaves dropped from a Gumoss. Used to make clothing.
A dish that is eaten during celebrations. It is essential when Pals lay eggs at the breeding farm.

Juice that improves mood when consumed. Drinking it greatly increases work speed for a period of time,
but lowers SAN.

Juice that greatly improves mood when consumed. Drinking it significantly increases work speed for a period of time,
but significantly lowers SAN.
A potion that allows the player to reset status points when consumed. It has no effect if consumed by Pal.
Bullets used in items like Handgun.
Spear made from Elizabee's staff, altered for human use. It is imbued with Elizabee's indomitable spirit.
A material required to create metal weapons and armor. Refined from Ore using a furnace.

Broncherry meat. Giant meat full of massive stores of energy.
Stuffed to the brim with nutrients gathered through photosynthesis.

Lamball meat. Red meat with a unique flavor.
Delicious, but takes some getting used to.
Cotton candy collected from Woolipop. Its sweetness fluffily melts away in your mouth.
High Quality Cloth woven from a large amount of Wool. Required to create high quality armor.
Fiber collected from trees. A material used when creating bows, etc.

Dumud meat. Fatty with a rich taste.
Has a mouthwatering plump texture.

Debris excavated from ancient ruins. Contains abundant information on lost technology.
Extremely valuable, people from all walks of life are now seeking such crystals.
